Postman Configuration¶

If not installed already, ensure that Postman 7.x is available on your local machine.

You will need to import the Postman collections for this lab in order to proceed.

Importing Postman Collections¶

  1. You will need to install the f5-postman-workflows framework into Postman:
    1. Open Postman
    2. Click the ‘Import’ button
    3. Select ‘Import from Link’
    4. Enter the following URL in the field
      1. https://github.com/6a6d/f5-pipeline/blob/master/Postman%20Collections/F5_AS3.json
    5. Click the ‘Import’ button
    6. Repeat the import process for the additional collections found below
      1. https://github.com/6a6d/f5-pipeline/blob/master/Postman%20Collections/F5_DO.json
      2. https://github.com/6a6d/f5-pipeline/blob/master/Postman%20Collections/F5_TS.json
    7. Ensure that each of the above collections were successfully imported.
